item.title: 在美国虾的主要供应国印度，美联社记录了挤在仓库里轮班工作 10 小时的妇女，她们每天只需支付 3 美元，就能剥出成堆的虾。
item.description:
In India, the leading supplier of American shrimp, AP documented women packed into warehouses for 10-hour shifts peeling endless piles of shrimp for as little as $3 a day.

Watchdogs say conditions in the industry constitute labor abuse. https://t.co/woODx9O27X

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 21, 2024

item.title: M.艾梅特-沃尔什（M. Emmet Walsh）是一位性格鲜明的演员，曾为《喋血双雄》和《银翼杀手》等影片塑造了鲜明的面孔和令人不安的形象，他的经纪人说，他已去世，享年 88 岁。
item.description:
M. Emmet Walsh, the character actor who brought his unmistakable face and unsettling presence to films including “Blood Simple” and “Blade Runner,” has died at age 88, his manager said. https://t.co/CnskWmBeDz

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据一份执法报告称，安吉拉-赵（Angela Chao）是一名航运业首席执行官，也是参议院少数党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）的小姨子，她上个月在得克萨斯州驾车冲入池塘时醉酒身亡。
item.description:
Angela Chao, a shipping industry CEO and sister-in-law to Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, was intoxicated when she drove into a pond and died last month in Texas, according to a law enforcement report. https://t.co/TRmbo2djiu

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 历史迷们可能知道偏远的圣赫勒拿岛是拿破仑-波拿巴的流放地，但这块英国海外领地还有另一个名声：一只名叫乔纳森的 192 岁乌龟。
item.description:
History buffs may know the remote island of St. Helena as the site of Napoleon Bonaparte’s exile, but the British overseas territory has another claim to fame: a 192-year-old tortoise named Jonathan. pic.twitter.com/R39M8Ir5xd

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 四年前的这个月，席卷全球的冠状病毒大流行降临美国。@anthonyted写道，三月的第三周是改变美国的一周。
item.description:
Four years ago this month, the coronavirus pandemic that was sweeping the world descended on the U.S. The third week of March was the week that changed America, @anthonyted wrote.

Read more from his story, originally published in March 2020. https://t.co/eoWfQehP1p

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024
